```{r}
test_list <- c(1000,5000,10000,50000,100000,300000)
wcss_list <- c()
for (i in test_list){
  hca <- loadHDF5SummarizedExperiment(dir = here("main/case_studies/data/full/hca_bonemarrow", paste0("hca_bonemarrow_", i, "x3000")), prefix="")
  set.seed(1234)
  wcss <- mbkmeans(counts(hca), clusters=k, batch_size = as.integer(dim(counts(sce))[2]*batch), calc_wcss = TRUE)$WCSS_per_cluster
  wcss_list <- c(wcss_list, wcss)
}
print(wcss_list)
```

```{r}
plot(test_list, wcss_list)
```
